original: @184b * // dpal spyan ras gzigs sku gdung rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //🔽mchod rten gyi ni cho ga brjod //🔽ji bzhin brtags shing sbyangs pa'i sa //🔽dri zhim chus bran gsang sngags brjod //🔽mgon po snying rje che rnal 'byor //🔽sangs rgyas bstan la rab gus pas //🔽yongs dag dkyil 'khor mdun byas te //🔽mchod sogs cho ga ji bzhin brtag / de'i rjes la bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor sngon du song bas mtshams bcad de /🔽aom a'a:bighn'am ta krita h'um zhes brjod do //🔽aom hr'i:badzra kha na kha na h'um /🔽sa rko ba'o //
analyzed: @184b * // dpal spyan ras gzigs sku gdung rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // mchod rten gyi ni cho ga brjod // ji bzhin brtags shing sbyangs pa'i sa // dri zhim chus bran gsang sngags brjod // mgon po snying rje che rnal 'byor // sangs rgyas bstan la rab gus pas // yongs dag dkyil 'khor mdun byas te // mchod sogs cho ga ji bzhin brtag / de'i rjes la bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor sngon du song bas mtshams bcad de / aom a'a:bighn'am ta krita h'um zhes brjod do // aom hr'i:badzra kha na kha na h'um / sa rko ba'o //
translated: Homage to the glorious Avalokiteśvara, whose relics shine.🔽🔽Now, I will explain🔽the procedure for the caitya.🔽🔽The ground should be examined and purified,🔽sprinkled with fragrant water, and the mantra recited.🔽🔽The lord of great compassion, the yogin,🔽who has great respect for the Buddha's teachings,🔽should make the completely pure maṇḍala in front🔽and examine the procedure for the offerings, and so forth.🔽🔽After that, having previously created the protection maṇḍala, one should block the directions,🔽reciting Oṃ āḥ vigha nam takṛt hūṃ.🔽🔽Oṃ hrīḥ vajra kha kha khāhi khāhi🔽is for digging the ground.🔽

original: aom hr'i:badzra a'a yu she h'um /🔽sa blang ba'o //🔽aom hr'i:badzra aa mri te h'um phat /🔽chu sbyang ba'o //🔽aom hr'i:aa badzra bh'u mi dhu li panytsa ratna h'um /

original: sa dag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sa dag par bya ba'o //
translated: purify the ground.

original: aom hr'i:badzra bha ba ni sva bh'a ba bi shuddha aa dho ye h'um /
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra bha ba ni sva bh'a ba bi shuddha aa dho ye h'um /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra bhavana svabhāva viśuddha adhiṣṭhāna hūṃ.

original: bsres nas brdzi ba'o //
analyzed: bsres nas brdzi ba'o //
translated: Mix and knead.

original: aom hr'i:badzra mung+ga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra mung+ga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra muṅgara ākotaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: brdung zhing mnal ba'o //
analyzed: brdung zhing mnal ba'o //
translated: Beat and pound.

original: aom hr'i: badzra audbha ba ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: badzra audbha ba ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra udbhava svāhā.

original: 'bi 'bi bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bi 'bi bya ba'o //
translated: Make the mold.

original: aom hr'i:badzra aa ra dze sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra aa ra dze sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra arāja svāhā.

original: til byug pa'o //
analyzed: til byug pa'o //
translated: Anoint with sesame oil.

original: aom hr'i:dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ dharmadhātugarbhe svāhā.

original: 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'o //
translated: Place the mold.

original: aom hr'i:dharma dh'a tu garbhe badzra r'u be ni rma na ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:dharma dh'a tu garbhe badzra r'u be ni rma na ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ dharmadhātugarbhe vajra rūpa veni rmaṇaya svāhā.

original: phyag rgyas 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgyas 'debs pa'o //
translated: Seal with the mudra.

original: aom hr'i:badzra mung+ga ra a'a ko ta kardza siddhe ho sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra mung+ga ra a'a ko ta kardza siddhe ho sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra muṅgara ākota karja siddhā ho svāhā.

original: thobs bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: thobs bskyod pa'o //
translated: Shake the mold.

original: aom hr'i:badzra lo ka n'a tha ni rma na pra ka se sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra lo ka n'a tha ni rma na pra ka se sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra lokanāthani rmaṇaya prakāśaya svāhā.🔽 Extract.

original: dbyung ba'o // aom hr'i:badzra su pra tishthi ta badzre sv'ah'a //
analyzed: dbyung ba'o // aom hr'i:badzra su pra tishthi ta badzre sv'ah'a //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra supratiṣṭhita vajre svāhā.

original: bzhugs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: bzhugs su gsol ba'o //
translated: Request to remain.🔽 Oṃ hrīḥ vajra muṅgara ākotaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hr'i:badzra tsakra pra brtan sv'ah'a //
analyzed: aom hr'i:badzra tsakra pra brtan sv'ah'a //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ vajra cakra pravarta svāhā.

original: 'khor lo gzugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo gzugs pa'o //
translated: This is for the form of the wheel.

original: aom hr'i:ma h'a tshtsa tro la h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:ma h'a tshtsa tro la h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ mahācakra trālo hūṃ svāhā.

original: gzugs dbul ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs dbul ba'o //
translated: This is for the offering of form.

original: aom hr'i:panytsa li ka b'astra h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:panytsa li ka b'astra h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ pañcalika vastra hūṃ svāhā.

original: na bza' gsol ba'o //
analyzed: na bza' gsol ba'o //
translated: This is for the offering of robes.

original: aom hr'i:sarba de sha ya aa bi di ksh'a ma ka ra h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:sarba de sha ya aa bi di ksh'a ma ka ra h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ sarva deśaya avinīkaśamkara hūṃ svāhā.

original: bzod par gsol ba'o //
analyzed: bzod par gsol ba'o //
translated: This is for the request for forbearance.

original: aom hr'i:a'aka sa dharma sva bh'a ba bi shuddha h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:a'aka sa dharma sva bh'a ba bi shuddha h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ākāśa dharmasvabhāva viśuddha hūṃ svāhā.

original: lha mchog nga rgyal brtan las dad pa yi //
analyzed: lha mchog nga rgyal brtan las dad pa yi //
translated: From the firm pride of the supreme deity,

original: g-yo ba 'od kyi phreng ba dkar bskyed de //
analyzed: g-yo ba 'od kyi phreng ba dkar bskyed de //
translated: generate the moving garland of light.

original: ye shes spyan drangs sku gsum rang bzhin la //
analyzed: ye shes spyan drangs sku gsum rang bzhin la //
translated: The wisdom being is invited into the nature of the three bodies,🔽and one should recite the mantra of the firm vajra.

original: de nyid rdo rje brtan pa'i sngags brjod gzhug / aom a'a:hr'i:badzra tri k'a ya pra tishthi te h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje brtan pa'i sngags brjod gzhug / aom a'a:hr'i:badzra tri k'a ya pra tishthi te h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ vajra trikāya pratiṣṭhite hūṃ svāhā.

original: rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: This is for the consecration.

original: aom na mo bha ga wa tyee ra sna ge tu r'a dz'a ya /
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga wa tyee ra sna ge tu r'a dz'a ya /
translated: Oṃ namo bhagavatyai āryatārāyai |

original: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
analyzed: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
translated: tathāgatāyai |

original: aarha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
analyzed: aarha te samyaksam buddh'a ya /
translated: Arhate, Samyak-Sambuddhaya.

original: tadya th'a / aom ratne ratne ratna bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ratne ratne ratna bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Tadyatha Om Ratne Ratne Ratnavijayesvaha.

original: aom a'a:hr'i: @185a * //
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i: @185a * //
translated: Om A: Hri:

original: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Hum phat svaha.

original: rten yongs su dag par bya ba dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rten yongs su dag par bya ba dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya'o //
translated: The support should be purified and the ritual should be perfect.

original: tsha tsha 'debs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
analyzed: tsha tsha 'debs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
translated: The ritual for establishing the caitya is complete.
